tool_description: Provides Stock Sentiment Data, News Analysis and more. Try for free.
name: StockBrain Data
title: StockBrain Data

api_list.name: entity_news_list
api_list.description: Get general news statistics on a entity.

required_parameters.name: entity_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the respective entity. Use search endpoint to query for entities and their ids.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: entity_news_list_timeframe
api_list.description: Get general news statistics on a entity.

required_parameters.name: entity_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the respective entity. Use search endpoint to query for entities and their ids.

required_parameters.name: timeframe
required_parameters.description: a timeframe parameter, see section 'Data Timeframe Guide' for all possible values

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: stock_sentiment_last
api_list.description: The stock sentiment is calculated on a daily basis.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: the ticker symbol of the respective stock

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: knowledge_search
api_list.description: Enter a search query and get a result list of all matching entities.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: search term (case insensitive) that will be compared against all entities in the StockBrain knowledge graph

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: stock_sentiment_timeframe_detail
api_list.description: The stock sentiment is calculated on a daily basis.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: the ticker symbol of the respective stock

required_parameters.name: timeframe
required_parameters.description: a timeframe parameter, see section 'Data Timeframe Guide' for all possible values

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: stock_news_list
api_list.description: Get general news statistics on a company.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: the ticker symbol of the respective stock

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

date.description: the date of this data point

news_count.description: the total count of news article on this day

positive_news.description: the number of news articles with positive sentiment

neutral_news.description: the number of news articles with neutral sentiment

negative_news.description: the number of news articles with negative sentiment

positive_news_percentage.description: the percentage of news articles with positive sentiment

negative_news_percentage.description: the percentage of news articles with negative sentiment

api_list.name: knowledge_entity_detail
api_list.description: Get general statistics on an entity.

required_parameters.name: entity_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the respective entity. Use search endpoint to query for entities and their ids.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: list_best_sentiment
api_list.description: The StockBrain Top 100 Sentiment Leaders is a collection of companies that is updated at least once per day. It contains companies that receive frequent media coverage (at least 50 articles per month), have posted above-average stock returns and have very high sentiment scores.

required_parameters.name: timeframe
required_parameters.description: the reference day with format DD-MM-YYYY

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.description: Get general news statistics on a company.

api_list.name: stock_list
api_list.description: List all stocks that are supported by this API. Use this endpoint to obtain a list of ticker symbols that must be passed to other endpoints. The data from this endpoint is updated once per day. It changes over time as new IPOs and acquisitions happen.

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: stock_detail
api_list.description: List all stocks that are supported by this API. Use this endpoint to obtain a list of ticker symbols that must be passed to other endpoints. The data from this endpoint is updated once per day. It changes over time as new IPOs and acquisitions happen.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: the ticker symbol of the respective stock

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Pass API key as query parameter if it is not passed through header.

api_list.name: health
api_list.description: This health check endpoint allows you to make test requests to our API. It is reachable without authentication. This endpoint may be used to troubleshoot connectivity issues. Hosts who spam this endpoint will be automatically flagged.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockbrain-data.p.rapidapi.com/health/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockbrain-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockbrain-data.p.rapidapi.com/health/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockbrain-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
